ingredients: 1 cup spice and brown sugar-rubbed pork tenderloin|2 tablespoons prepared barbecue sauce|1 whole-wheat hamburger bun, split or 2 slices whole wheat bread

name: red velvet cake
ingredients: 1 tablespoon unsalted butter|3 1/2 cups cake flour|1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa (not Dutch process)|1 1/2 teaspoons salt|2 cups canola oil|2 1/4 cups granulated sugar|3 large eggs|6 tablespoons (3 ounces) red food coloring or 1 teaspoon red gel food coloring dissolved in 6 tablespoons of water|1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla|1 1/4 cup buttermilk|2 teaspoons baking soda|2 1/2 teaspoons white vinegar.

name: Risotto
ingredients: 1 ½ cup arborio (or risotto) rice|4 ½ cups chicken stock|1 cup finely grated parmesan|40 g unsalted butter|sea salt and cracked black pepper

name: Samosa
ingredients: 3 medium sized potatoes boiled and mashed|1/4 cup peas blanched|1 teaspoon cumin seeds|1 teaspoon fennel seeds|1.5 teaspoons ginger paste|1.5 teaspoons green chilli paste|1 teaspoon dry mango powder or lemon juice|1 teaspoon garam masala|Salt to taste|Handfuls fresh corriander leaves optional|Handful of cashews and raisins|1 cup ap flour|1/2 teaspoon ajwain seeds|Oil for deep frying and 2 tbsp for kneading the dough|1 tablespoon ghee|2 tablespoons rice flour

name: Scallops
ingredients: 18 scallops|Sea salt, to taste|1 small bunch fresh cilantro, chopped|Ground esplette pepper, to taste

ingredients: 1 pound spaghetti|1/2 pound bacon, sliced crosswise into 1/2-inch pieces|3 large eggs|1 cup grated parmesan cheese, plus extra for serving (optional)|Freshly ground black pepper
